title: Eye Spring
summaries: The Eye Spring is a pet-summoning item that has a 6.67*1/15 (6.67%) / 10*1/10 (10%) chance of being dropped by Eyezor during a Solar Eclipse. Using this item gives the character a buff which causes an Eyeball Spring pet to tag along. To catch up with the player, the Eyeball Spring spins its tentacles.

statistics.Sell: 3
